item.title: Leslie add a quote by Richard Peck
Leslie add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "Be yourself; everyone else is already taken." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Leslie add a quote by Michael Pollan
item.description: "What an extraordinary achievement for a civilization: to have developed the one diet that reliably makes its people sick!" -- Michael Pollan

item.title: Leslie add a quote by Dexter Kozen
item.description: "Shadows of a thousand years rise again unseen, Voices whisper in the trees, Tonight is Halloween!" -- Dexter Kozen
